status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1bq8i","text":"In one sampling site, choose 5 places as the average","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"17bgk","text":"Remove the topsoil, take the soil at a distance of 5-7 cm from the soil surface, and put it into a plastic zipper bag","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ct8ad","text":"Mix the soil evenly, and then add soil into 2 separate HDPE plastic bottles","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"95ao6","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"807ce","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6qav","text":"1 bottle with desiccant called “RT” (meaning room temperature); 1 bottle called “Cold”","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bmt8q","text":"Put the “Cold” one into the insulated bag; put the “RT” into a backpack","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cvepl","text":"Take 2 pictures:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fb21f","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"c70v2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":[100,"451"],"data":[["1st","Take a picture at the sampling site"],["2nd","Take another picture at sampling site, and put the recode paper beside"]],"guid":"46045980EE4F11EC9A1D173004872F7A","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["1st","Take a picture at the sampling site"],["2nd","Take another picture at sampling site, and put the recode paper beside"]],"rowHeights":[23,23]}}}}
